perturbation.original_text: Horst Entertainment agrees to pay Galactcomm $0.01 (one cent) per access up to 400,000 accesses thereafter payment shall be $0.005 (one-half cent) per access. Horst Entertainment shall send this amount to Galacticomm by no later than Wednesday for accesses used from the previuos week (Monday thru Sunday).
perturbation.changed_text: Horst Entertainment agrees to pay Galactcomm $0.01 (one cent) per access up to 400,000 accesses thereafter payment shall be $0.005 (one-half cent) per access. Horst Entertainment shall send this amount to Galacticomm by no later than Wednesday for accesses used from the previuos week (Monday thru Sunday). However, if the total amount due is less than $100, payment is due on the last day of the month.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction in the payment deadline. The original text specifies a Wednesday deadline for weekly access fees. The added clause introduces a different deadline (last day of the month) if the amount due is less than $100, creating ambiguity on which deadline applies. This could lead to disputes about late payments and breach of contract.

perturbation.original_text: Galacticomm must provide a person(s) to correct any technical problems (Server being down or inaccessible) 24 hours per day, 7 days per week. This person(s) must be available by beeper or telephone. Horst Entertainment shall provide this same 24 hour service at the broadcast location.
perturbation.changed_text: Galacticomm must provide a person(s) to correct any technical problems (Server being down or inaccessible) 24 hours per day, 7 days per week. This person(s) must be available by beeper or telephone. Horst Entertainment shall provide this same 24 hour service at the broadcast location. However, Galacticomm's 24/7 support obligation is limited to business hours (9am-5pm EST) on weekends.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction regarding Galacticomm's support obligation. The original text specifies 24/7 support. The added clause limits support to business hours on weekends, creating uncertainty about the level of support provided on weekends. This creates ambiguity about which terms should be enforced, leading to disputes over contractual obligations.

perturbation.original_text: In the event Galacticomm, Inc. chooses to terminate this agreement, Horst Entertainment Inc. will have the right to purchase a license copy of the software in the amount of $15,000.00.
perturbation.changed_text: In the event Galacticomm, Inc. chooses to terminate this agreement, Horst Entertainment Inc. will have the right to purchase a license copy of the software in the amount of $15,000.00. However, if the termination is due to Horst Entertainment's breach of contract, this right is void.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction about Horst Entertainment's right to purchase the software license upon termination. The original text states they have the right to purchase in the event of termination by Galacticomm. The added clause removes this right if the termination is due to Horst's breach, creating uncertainty about the circumstances under which they can exercise this right. This leads to ambiguity regarding which terms should be enforced, potentially leading to disputes.
